Deprecated API

  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.lenskit.data.dao.EventDAO
    Use new DataAccessObject.
    org.lenskit.data.dao.ItemDAO
    Use new DataAccessObject.
    org.lenskit.data.dao.ItemEventDAO
    Use new DataAccessObject.
    org.lenskit.data.dao.ItemNameDAO
    org.grouplens.lenskit.scored.ScoredId
    Scored IDs are going away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.lenskit.data.dao.UserDAO
    Use the new DataAccessObject.
    org.lenskit.data.dao.UserEventDAO
    Use DataAccessObject.
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    org.grouplens.lenskit.scored.AbstractScoredId
    Scored IDs are going away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.BitSetIterator
    Will be moved or removed in LensKit 3.0.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.CollectionUtils
    Collection utils have been moved to lenskit-core.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.symbols.DoubleSymbolValue
    Symbols are going away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.ImmutableSparseVector
    Use maps instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.LongKeyDomain
    Replaced by LongKeyIndex.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.LongUtils
    Replaced by equivalent class in lenskit-core.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.cli.Main
    Use Main.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.collections.MoreArrays
    Methods in this class still in use will be migrated to lenskit-core.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.MutableSparseVector
    Use maps instead
    org.grouplens.lenskit.scored.PackedScoredIdList
    Scored IDs are going away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.lenskit.data.dao.PrefetchingItemDAO
    org.grouplens.lenskit.scored.ScoredIdBuilder
    Scored IDs are going away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.scored.ScoredIdListBuilder
    Scored IDs are going away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.scored.ScoredIds
    Scored IDs are going away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.SparseVector
    Use maps instead.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.symbols.Symbol
    Symbols are being removed in LensKit 3.0.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.symbols.SymbolValue
    Symbols are going away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.symbols.TypedSymbol
    Symbols are going away in LensKit 3.0.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.lenskit.LenskitRecommenderEngineBuilder.build()
    Use LenskitRecommenderEngineBuilder.build(DataAccessObject)
    org.lenskit.LenskitRecommender.build(LenskitConfiguration)
    Use LenskitRecommender.build(LenskitConfiguration, DataAccessObject)
    org.lenskit.LenskitConfiguration.buildGraph()
    This shouldn’t be used anymore.
    org.lenskit.data.ratings.Rating.create(long, long, double)
    Use EntityFactory.rating(long, long, double)
    org.lenskit.data.ratings.Rating.create(long, long, double, long)
    Use EntityFactory.rating(long, long, double, long)
    org.lenskit.LenskitRecommenderEngine.createRecommender()
    Use LenskitRecommenderEngine.createRecommender(DataAccessObject)
    org.lenskit.data.ratings.Rating.createUnrate(long, long, long)
    Unrates have gone away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.SparseVector.fast()
    Fast iteration is going away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.SparseVector.fast(VectorEntry.State)
    Fast iteration is going away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.SparseVector.fastIterator()
    Fast iteration is going away.
    org.grouplens.lenskit.vectors.SparseVector.fastIterator(VectorEntry.State)
    Fast iteration is going away.
    org.lenskit.inject.RecommenderInstantiator.forConfig(LenskitConfiguration)
    org.lenskit.util.keys.LongSortedArraySet.getDomain()
    Use LongSortedArraySet.getIndex().
    org.lenskit.knn.item.model.ItemItemBuildContext.getItemPairIterator()
    This will go away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.lenskit.knn.item.model.ItemItemBuildContext.getItemPairs()
    This will go away in LensKit 3.0.
    org.lenskit.data.ratings.Rating.hasValue()
    Unrates have gone away.
    org.lenskit.inject.AbstractConfigContext.in(Annotation, Class<?>)
    org.lenskit.LenskitConfigContext.in(Annotation, Class<?>)
    org.lenskit.inject.AbstractConfigContext.in(Class<?>)
    org.lenskit.LenskitConfigContext.in(Class<?>)
    org.lenskit.inject.AbstractConfigContext.in(Class<? extends Annotation>, Class<?>)
    org.lenskit.LenskitConfigContext.in(Class<? extends Annotation>, Class<?>)
    org.grouplens.lenskit.util.io.LKFileUtils.isCompressed(File)
    Use CompressionMode or commons-compress facilities instead.
    org.lenskit.config.ConfigurationLoader.load(Closure<?>)
    Use ConfigHelpers.load(groovy.lang.Closure) instead.
    org.lenskit.LenskitRecommenderEngine.load(File, ClassLoader)
    Use LenskitRecommenderEngineLoader for sophisticated loading.
    org.lenskit.config.ConfigHelpers.load(String)
    Loading from Groovy source strings is confusing.
    org.lenskit.config.ConfigurationLoader.load(String)
    Loading from Groovy sources as strings is confusing.
    org.lenskit.data.ratings.Ratings.make(long, long, double)
    Use Rating.create(long, long, double).
    org.lenskit.data.ratings.Ratings.make(long, long, double, long)
    Use Rating.create(long, long, double, long)
    org.lenskit.transform.normalize.ItemVectorNormalizer.makeTransformation(long, SparseVector)
    Use ItemVectorNormalizer.makeTransformation(long, Long2DoubleMap).
    org.lenskit.transform.normalize.UserVectorNormalizer.makeTransformation(long, SparseVector)
    Use UserVectorNormalizer.makeTransformation(long, Long2DoubleMap).
    org.lenskit.transform.normalize.VectorNormalizer.makeTransformation(SparseVector)
    Use VectorNormalizer.makeTransformation(Long2DoubleMap).
    org.lenskit.transform.normalize.ItemVectorNormalizer.normalize(long, SparseVector, MutableSparseVector)
    Old vectors are going away.
    org.lenskit.transform.normalize.UserVectorNormalizer.normalize(long, SparseVector, MutableSparseVector)
    Old vectors are going away.
    org.lenskit.transform.normalize.VectorNormalizer.normalize(SparseVector, MutableSparseVector)
    Old vectors are going away.
    org.lenskit.data.dao.EntityQueryBuilder.setEntityType(EntityType)
    Just provide a type at construction time.
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.lenskit.data.dao.EventCollectionDAO(Collection<? extends Event>)
    use EventCollectionDAO.create(Collection) instead
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.sql.JDBCRatingDAO(Connection, SQLStatementFactory)
    Use JDBCRatingDAO.newBuilder().
    org.grouplens.lenskit.data.sql.JDBCRatingDAO(Connection, SQLStatementFactory, boolean)
    Use JDBCRatingDAO.newBuilder().
    org.lenskit.util.keys.Long2DoubleSortedArrayMap(Map<Long, Double>)
    org.lenskit.knn.item.model.SimilarityMatrixModel(SortedKeyIndex, List<Long2DoubleMap>)
    This is deprecated for public usage. It is better to use the other constructor.

    Enum Constant and Description

    org.lenskit.data.dao.SortOrder.ITEM
